title: Need Mid Laner for Silver-Gold Ranked 5's Team
body:
My goal is to put together a team of people who will stick together and help each other improve. We will try to play mostly in the afternoon during the week. If this interests you then leave your:

IGN:
Time Zone:
Curse Voice (Y/N):
Rank Last Season:
Current Rank:
Top 5 Champs:
Why you want to join this team:

replies.body:
IGN: ImTryingToLearn
Time Zone: Central
Curse Voice (Y/N): Yes
Rank Last Season: Gold 2
Current Rank: Plat 5 (I know its Gold/Silver team, if its fine with you)
Top 5 Champs: Ahri, Azir, Leblanc, Syndra, Xerath
Why you want to join this team: Ranked 5's is the best part of League and its fun to have people to play with some organization.
